Plant expert Doug Welsh says when you ______ a rosebush, crape myrtle or shade tree, first remove dead, broken or diseased parts.
Does outer space even rob you of something to which you can ______ a spring?
result.chn: 在外太空中你是否,不再能够固定住弹簧(基础物理课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: ______, The Faerie Queenecan be said, however strangely, to be the first great poetic celebration in English of the institution of marriage.
result.chn: 然而无论《仙后》多么与众不同，它仍可被称为，第一部伟大的有关婚姻的,英文诗歌体盛典。(弥尔顿课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Mister Veblen argued that people gathered wealth for the purpose of "______ consumption."
He's tyrannical, he's ______, he's undisciplined, he's over-sexed.
result.chn: 残暴，贪婪，毫无修养，沉溺美色。(旧约导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Anyway the only point I'm making here is, paranoia is a healthy human ______.
result.chn: 总之这里我想说的就一点，偏执是一个正常人类的特质。(计算机科学及编程导论课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)

result.problem: Bretton Woods Project, an NGO that acts as a watchdog to ______ "The problem is which countries will be able to access this credit line.
I think that his ______ way of bringing things down to earth when they get a little too highfalutin' involves the skill of a genuine stand-up comic.
result.chn: 我认为他是真的有漫画人物的效果,当他总是面无表情的’,让那些过分骄傲的人回归现实。(文学理论导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: (To ______ this disturbing trend,) government agencies and private companies are using public service announcements and safety events to raise awareness.
I felt we had nothing in common but "______," our Irishness.
result.chn: 我和他们除了都是小丑“,都是爱尔兰人之外没什么区别。(现代诗歌课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Incidentally, the New York Times had another article about Redleaf, saying that he was really one of the first persons to clearly ______ the subprime crisis that we're now in.
result.chn: 顺便提一下,《纽约时报》中,另一篇关于雷德利夫的报道,说他是第一位,真正清晰描述了目前的次贷危机(金融市场课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: There's some problem with that; it's not economic, so let's not be too ______.
result.chn: 这样做还是有问题,这不赚钱,所以不要高兴太早(金融市场课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: And so it's an understandable ______ on Milton's part that he needs to vilify Shakespeare by identifying that great poet, his older contemporary, with Comus.
result.chn: 所以就弥尔顿而言，是一个可理解的事,他需要通过认同那伟大的诗句来贬低莎士比亚，用Comus来压倒比他年纪较大的同时代人。(弥尔顿课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)
